Created an attachment (id=73645)
patch applied to HEAD

the NPE occurs when selecting function elements in the dialog

Andrew, I am curious. The fix that you have checked in makes changes to the C/C++-search, wheras the stack-trace comes from the OpenElement functionality.
How could that possibly fix the NPE?
Actually I don't understand how you would be able to trigger this exception in the first place??

The fix for the NPE was in IndexTypeInfo.createInfo in the case where the element is an IFunction. (Prior to the fix, selecting a function element in the OpenElement dialog would result in an error dialog)

 Just for consistency, I strengthened the construction conditions for IndexTypeInfo so that its IIndex field may not be null (in order that its methods may be called without NPE), and adapted two search routines such that a valid IIndex object is available for the IndexTypeInfo construction. (I couldn't find a way that the search clients could call the failing methods either though)
